programme.title: הרפתקאות בלנקט החתול (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בלנקט הוא חתול ביתי שמפחד לעזוב את דירתו. לאחר שקייפ, בנו הסקרן מחליט לעזוב את הבית ולצאת להרפתקה בעקבות גן העדן לחתולים, בלנקט חייב להתגבר על עברו ועל הפחד שלו מפני הרחוב. דיבוב לעב'. במאי: גארי וונג, 2018.

programme.title: מרוץ החיות הגדול (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקה במהירות גבוהה. קופיף איטי שאוהב לקחת את הזמן, מחליט להירשם לתחרות של מירוץ מכוניות. מטרתו היא לזכות בפרס הראשון, כך יוכל להציל את ביתה של סבתו שנמצא בסכנה. קולות: קובי ליקורמן, ספיר דרמון. במאי: רוס ונוקור, 2023.

programme.title: אבא אווזה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה מהיוצרים של 'שרק'. ג'ק הוא אווז קורע מצחוק שמסרב להתבגר. הכל משתנה כשהוא פוגש במקרה שני ברווזונים קטנים שהלכו לאיבוד, ומכריזים עליו כעת כעל אבא ואמא. דיבוב: טל פרידמן. במאי: כריס ג'נקינס. 2018. כ' עב'.\r\n.

programme.title: בלאגן על ארבע (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מקסימה. כלבלב מפונק מוצא עצמו ברחוב לאחר שנמלט מהילדים החמדנים של בעליו הקודמים. כעת כשהוא מנסה לשרוד בעולם האמיתי, באים לעזרתו כלב רחוב קשוח ומוזיקאית צעירה. דיבוב: דן קיזלר, דקלה הדר. במאי: קווין ג'ונסון. 2019.

programme.title: סוס פרא (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מדובבת לעברית. סיפור המערב הפרוע דרך עיניו של סוס המשוטט ברחבי אמריקה הלא מיושבת. במסעו הוא פוגש את האדם בפעם הראשונה, מגלה טיבה של חברות ומתאהב בסוסה יפהפיה. במאים: קלי אסברי, לורנה קוק. ארה"ב, 2002.

programme.title: מאווקה נסיכת היער (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. מאווקה היא נסיכה ביער קסום ותפקידה לשמור עליו ועל הטבע. כאשר בן אנוש ומוסיקאי מוכשר מופיע, ניצוצות האהבה עפים ומאווקה חייבת לבחור בין תפקידה כשומרת היער לבין אהבתה לבן האנוש. דיבוב עב': תובל שפיר. 2023.

programme.title: מדגסקר: מקרקסים את אירופה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מדובבת לעברית. אלכס, מרטי, גלוריה ומלמן החיות האהובות חוזרים בהרפתקה חדשה והפעם הם מצטרפים לקרקס בכדי לחזור לגן החיות שלהם בניו יורק. במאי: קונראד ורנון, אריק דארנל, וטום מק'גארת'. 2012. כ' עב'.

programme.title: לשיר (מדובב)
programme.desc: להיט אנימציה מוזיקלי. בעיר של חיות אנושיות, במטרה להציל את התאטרון שלו מפני סגירה, מארגן דב קואלה שאפתן תחרות שירה שתזכה את המנצח בפרס ענק. דיבוב: צביקה הדר, במאי: גארת ג'נינגס, כריסטוף לורדלה. ארה"ב, 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: לשיר 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: המשך הרפתקאותיהם של חבורת החיות המוזיקליות. כשבאסטר מון מבטיח לאמרגן מפוקפק שישיג למופע כוכב רוק אגדי שנעלם לפני שנים, עליהם לעשות הכל כדי להעלות מופע שלא ישכח לעולם. קולות עב': אורי זלצמן, דקלה הדר.2021 כ' עב'.

programme.title: מיה והאריה הלבן (מדובב)
programme.desc: דרמת הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. מיה בת ה-10 נאלצת לעזוב את לונדון ולעבור עם הוריה לאפריקה, שם היא מפתחת ידידות אמיצה עם גור אריות לבן ויפהפה. עם: דאניה די וילייה, מלאני לורן. דיבוב: מאיה שפירא. במאי: ז'יל דה מייסטרה. 2018.

programme.title: נורם בעיר הגדולה 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. דב הקוטב המדבר חוזר בהרפתקה חדשה! והפעם נורם מגיע לניו יורק והופך מגיבור למבוקש. במקביל עליו להציל את הקוטב מפני חברה המתכננת להפוך את הקרח לבקבוקי מים מינרליים. דיבוב: אורי זלצמן. במאי: טים מלטבי. 2018. כ' עב'.

programme.title: כיפה אדומה סוגרת חשבון
programme.desc: אנימציה. סרט ההמשך ל"כיפה אדומה-הסיפור האמיתי". כיפ מוקפצת ע"י סוכנות "באושר ובעושר", ויוצאת ביחד עם הזאב המעופף והסבתא הלוחמנית להציל את עמי ותמי מידי המכשפה הרעה. דיבוב: היידן פנטייר, גלן קלוז. במאי: מייק דסה. 2011.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.

programme.title: התיבה של נוח (מדובב)
programme.desc: הרפתקת אנימציה מקסימה מבוססת סיפור המבול. שני עכברים מוכשרים מצליחים להתגנב לתיבת נוח בעת המבול. הם עוזרים לנח במשימתו להציל את יצורי כדור הארץ והכל, באמצעות כוחה של המוזיקה... דיבוב עב': יובל בינדר, פז פרל. 2024.

programme.title: קטן עליהם (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. החיים בעיר חוף שלווה ביוון מתערערים, כאשר אל הים פוסידון מתחיל להתרגז ולשלוח גלים סוערים. למשימת ההצלה נדרשת עכברה קטנה ואמיצה, שאוספת כמה חברים וביחד הם מנסים להציל את העיר מזעמו של פוסידון. דיבוב עב'. 2022.

programme.title: סיפור הברווזים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מהיוצרים של "המיניונים". משפחת ברווזים יוצאת לראשונה לחופשה מפנקת בג'מייקה. בטעות מגיעה המשפחה לניו-יורק. וכעת היא צריכה למצוא את דרכה החוצה מהעיר שהיא הכל חוץ מגן עדן לברווזים. דיבוב: רשף לוי. 2023 כ' עב'.

programme.title: תעלול של משלוח (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. המשך ללהיט "תעלול של טיול". צמד החברים מהג'ונגל, הדוב מיק מיק ואוסקר הארנב יוצאים להרפתקה מסמרת שיער בכדור פורח, כדי לאתר את הוריו של גור דוב גריזלי קטן ונטוש. דיבוב עב': אמנון וולף, אור דגן. 2022.

programme.title: הג'ונגל של קואטי (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. חוטמן חביב, פרפר חסר פחד וצפרדע ברברבן מתייצבים על המשמר, על מנת להגן על יער הגשם בו הם מתגוררים מפני נחשית מרושעת המבקשת להשתלט עליו. דיבוב עב': קובי ליקורמן, יובל בינדר, אלונה אלכסנדר. 2021.

programme.title: בלינג בלינג (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סם, מכונאי בפארק שעשועים בטוח שרק עם טבעת יהלום נוצצת יזכה בלב נערת חלומותיו, אך אז מופיע אוסקר הרשע עם טבעת ותוכנית זדונית משלו... דיבוב: ישראל גולדרט. בימוי: קיונג הו לי, וונג'י לי. ד. קוריאה, 2016. כ' עב'.

programme.title: הפינגווינים ממדגסקר (מדובב)
programme.desc: חברים מדובבים: סרטים בשפה שלנו. הפינגווינים המשעשעים מסרטי "מדגסקר" מככבים בסרט משלהם. הפעם הם משתפים פעולה עם ארגון ריגול מיוחד, במאבק מול תמנון ערמומי. דיבוב עברית: מיכאל הנגבי. 2014. כ' עב'.

programme.title: נורם בעיר הגדולה 3 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה. נורם והחברים חוזרים! והפעם יוצא דב הצפון החביב למשימה חובקת עולם במטרה להשיב למקום מושבו בסין פסל מיוחד שנגנב ע"י ארכיאולוג מרושע. דיבוב: אורי זלצמן. במאים: ט. מלטבי, ר. פין. 2019. כ' עב'.\r\n.

programme.title: גנוב על המיניונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סרט ההמשך ל"גנוב על הירח". גרו מגויס הפעם לליגת האנטי-רשעים כדי להתמודד עם אויב חדש, ויוצא בעקבותיו יחד עם המיניונים המצחיקים והסוכנת לוסי. דיבוב עב': אוהד שחר, ליאת הר-לב. במאים: פייר קופין, כריס רניוד. 2013.

programme.title: סוניק הסרט 3 (מדובב)
programme.desc: סוניק הקיפוד האהוב והמהיר בעולם חוזר להרפתקה מרהיבה חדשה! סוניק, נאקלס וטיילס מתאחדים נגד יריב חדש ועוצמתי בשם שאדו, בעל כוחות חדשים ומיסתוריים שלא נראו כמותם עד כה. עם: ג'ים קארי. דיבוב לעב': לירון לב. במאי: ג'ף פאולר. 2024.

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את המורה (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיה. פליקס מכווץ בטעות את מנהלת בית הספר הקשוחה לגובה של 15 ס"מ. כשכולם בטוחים שעשה זאת בכוונה, הוא יוצא להרפתקה להוכיח את חפותו ולמנוע את סגירת ביה"ס. במאי: סוון אונטרוואלד. גרמניה, 2015. כ' עב'.

programme.title: רובוטריקים: ההתחלה
programme.desc: אנימציה מלאת אקשן, הסרט השמיני בסדרת סרטי "רובוטריקים". הסיפור שמעולם לא סופר אודות כיצד אופטימוס פריים ומגאטרון הפכו למנהיגי הרובוטריקים ואויבים מושבעים. דיבוב: כריס המסוורת', סקרלט ג'והנסון. במאי: ג'וש קולי. 2024.

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב
programme.desc: השידורים יתחדשו בקרוב.(n)

programme.title: אבא אווזה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה מהיוצרים של 'שרק'. ג'ק הוא אווז קורע מצחוק שמסרב להתבגר. הכל משתנה כשהוא פוגש במקרה שני ברווזונים קטנים שהלכו לאיבוד, ומכריזים עליו כעת כעל אבא ואמא. דיבוב: טל פרידמן. במאי: כריס ג'נקינס. 2018. כ' עב'.\r\n.(n)

programme.title: מוריס המדהים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות מהיוצרים של "שרק", ע"פ ספר הילדים האהוב. חתול מטורלל בעל לב זהב, מגיע אל עיירה חדשה עם חבריו העכברים, ושני ילדים סקרנים. יחד הם נקלעים להרפתקאה מסוכנת במיוחד. דיבוב: אסף פריינטא. במאי: טובי גנקל. 2022. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: פנדה באפריקה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מרגשת. פנדה צעיר והרפתקן יוצא למסע מסין לאפריקה כדי להציל את חברתו הדרקונית שנעלמה. בדרך הוא מגלה עולם מוזר ומדהים בו נאלץ להתמודד עם היפופוטמים מפחידים, צבועים חשדניים וגורילות חכמות. דיבוב עב': אלונה אלכסנדר. 2024.(n)

programme.title: חלומו של דולפין (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. סיפורו המופלא של דניאל, דולפין צעיר שחולם לשחות בגלים הגדולים שמחוץ ללגונה הקטנה שבה הוא חי. לילה אחד ניתנת לו ההזדמנות, והוא יוצא למסע קסום במרחבי הים הפתוח. במאי: אדוארדו שולדט. 2010. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מדגסקר 2 (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. המשך עלילותיהם של תושבי גן החיות הניו יורקי שננטשו על האי מדגסקר. אלכס האריה, מרטי הזברה, מלמן הג'ירפה, וגלוריה ההיפופוטם - מחליטים לעזוב את האי ומגיעים לאפריקה! במאי: אריק דארנל. 2008. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: מדגסקר: מקרקסים את אירופה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה מדובבת לעברית. אלכס, מרטי, גלוריה ומלמן החיות האהובות חוזרים בהרפתקה חדשה והפעם הם מצטרפים לקרקס בכדי לחזור לגן החיות שלהם בניו יורק. במאי: קונראד ורנון, אריק דארנל, וטום מק'גארת'. 2012. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הקרודים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. משפחת הקרודים הקדמונית תמיד נשארה במערה הבטוחה שלה. לאחר שהמערה נהרסת, הקרודים נחשפים לראשונה לנוף מרהיב ועולם חדש ומופלא. קולות: דקלה הדר, לירון לב, רבקה מיכאלי. במאים: קירק דה-מיקו, כריס סנדרס. 2013. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: גנוב על העולם (מדובב)
programme.desc: להיט האנימציה עם המיניונים שמגניבים אותנו מחדש! גרו מגלה לראשונה שיש לו אח התאום והמוצלח. יחדיו, הם מתכננים לקחת מבלתזאר הנבל את היהלום שגנב ולהציל את העולם. קולות: אוהד שחר. בימוי: קייל בלדה, פייר קופין. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הדרקון הראשון שלי (מדובב)
programme.desc: היקאפ הצעיר מנסה להרשים את אביו ולהגן על כפרו מדרקונים. כשיום אחד הוא מגלה דרקון צעיר, מתפתחת בין השניים חברות מקסימה שמובילה את הכפר לעתיד טוב יותר. במאי: דין דה-בלויס. 2010. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הצילו! כיווצתי את ההורים (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית הרפתקאות. רוחה של מנהלת מרשעת מטילה כישוף על בית הספר והופכת את כולם לזעירים. כעת על פליקס, שהוריו כווצו, וחברתו הטובה אלה לנסות ולהציל את המצב לפני שיהיה מאוחר מידי. דיבוב עברית: ניר פרץ. גרמניה, 2018. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: אגדה ממבט ראשון (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה בדיבוב קורע של דניאל סטיופין (אנטולי מ"קופה ראשית"). אביר צעיר ואמיץ לב יוצא ביחד עם חרבו המטורללת וחברים נוספים, למסע להשבת אבן עתיקה שנגנבה מארמון המלך, וכעת אחדות הממלכה נמצאת בסכנה. 2021. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הנסיך וסינדרלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: פנטזיית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה בדיבוב של אליאנה תדהר. סיפורה של סינדרלה, נערה יפת תואר וטובת לב, שאמה ואחותה החורגות מתייחסות אליה כמו למשרתת. חייה משתנים כשבאחד הטיולים שלה ביער היא פוגשת בנסיך הממלכה. עם: אסטריד אס. 2021.(n)

programme.title: ליברפול - בורנמות
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: כדורגל. ליברפול - בורנמות, הליגה האנגלית, מחזור 1, עונת 2025/26. אלופת אנגליה, ליברפול, מתחילה במסע ההגנה על התואר מול בורנמות, במשחק פתיחת העונה של הפרמיירליג.(n)

programme.title: Widow Clicquot
programme.desc: In the late 18th century, a group of women create the Veuve Clicquot champagne business. Drama, starring Haley Bennett, Tom Sturridge and Sam Riley.(n)

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Oh! What a Lovely War
programme.desc: First World War musical, comprising a series of satirical sketches highlighting the futility of conflict from the perspective of the ordinary soldiers - many from the same family - and covering famous historical moments, including the Christmas truce. Richard Attenborough's directorial debut, starring Ralph Richardson, Laurence Olivier, John Mills and John Gielgud.(n)

programme.title: Speak Like a Child
programme.desc: A couple are reunited with a man they grew up with in a children's home years earlier - but the apparently happy reunion soon dredges up dark secrets from their past, and it's not long before tensions bubble to the surface. Drama, starring Cal Macaninch, Daniel Newman, Richard Mylan and Rachel Fielding.(n)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A shy man struggling to cope with a recent break-up is horrified to learn his impulsive former girlfriend has had all recollection of their relationship erased from her mind. He gets even by having the same treatment, but during the procedure he relives their time together and falls for her again, leaving him determined to keep his memories. Michel Gondry's surreal romantic drama, with Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson and Elijah Wood.(n)

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: When two young men cross paths in Berlin, a simple afternoon in the big city soon takes on a much greater meaning. Drama, starring Matthew Morrison and Alexandros Koutsoulis.(n)

programme.title: Widow Clicquot
programme.desc: In the late 18th century, a group of women create the Veuve Clicquot champagne business. Drama, starring Haley Bennett, Tom Sturridge and Sam Riley.(n)

Drama, starring Cal Macaninch, Daniel Newman, Richard Mylan and Rachel Fielding.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.(n)

programme.title: Drift
programme.desc: A young woman escapes her war-torn country to a Greek island, growing close with a tour guide as the pair find hope in each other. Director Anthony Chen's drama, starring Cynthia Erivo and Alia Shawkat.(n)

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: D'Artagnan faces a race against time to rescue his kidnapped sweetheart, the queen's seamstress and confidante Constance. The young woman's survival may rest with Milady, compelling D'Artagnan to forge an uneasy alliance with his former enemy. Meanwhile, King Louis XIII faces the prospect of civil war, fuelled by conspirators within his royal court. Swashbuckling sequel, starring François Civil, Eva Green and Vincent Cassel.(n)

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.(n)

programme.title: You Can Live Forever
programme.desc: After moving into a Jehovah's Witness community, lesbian teenager Jamie begins a life-changing love affair with the daughter of a prominent Witness Elder. Drama, starring Anwen O'Driscoll and June Laporte.(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A lonely and past-his-prime American actor travels to Japan to film a commercial. During a depressing night in the hotel bar, he meets a spirited younger woman and the pair strike up a close friendship, exploring Tokyo and helping each other face the mundanities of everyday life. Sofia Coppola's comedy drama, starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi.(n)

programme.title: Poison

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.desc: After moving into a Jehovah's Witness community, lesbian teenager Jamie begins a life-changing love affair with the daughter of a prominent Witness Elder. Drama, starring Anwen O'Driscoll and June Laporte.(n)

programme.title: Drift
programme.desc: A young woman escapes her war-torn country to a Greek island, growing close with a tour guide as the pair find hope in each other. Director Anthony Chen's drama, starring Cynthia Erivo and Alia Shawkat.(n)

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: A nouveau riche socialite with a murky past tries to buy his way into high society. A young man from the Midwest is drawn into his glamorous world, and witnesses the playboy's ultimately tragic efforts to win back the love of his life, now married to a far more respectable husband. Oscar-winning drama, based on F Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, starring Robert Redford, Mia Farrow, Sam Waterston, Bruce Dern, Karen Black and Scott Wilson.

programme.title: Poison
programme.desc: Lucas and Edith reunite many years after a tragedy drove the former couple apart. Director Désirée Nosbusch's award-winning drama, starring Tim Roth and Trine Dyrholm.

programme.title: You Can Live Forever
programme.desc: After moving into a Jehovah's Witness community, lesbian teenager Jamie begins a life-changing love affair with the daughter of a prominent Witness Elder. Drama, starring Anwen O'Driscoll and June Laporte.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess prodigy Bobby Fischer challenges the best player in the Soviet Union in a top championship, causing the two nations to use the event to fuel their respective agendas. Fischer soon finds himself caught between the two superpowers as well as having to deal with his own struggles. Tobey Maguire and Liev Schreiber star in this fact-based sporting drama set in 1972 during the Cold War.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Concerned about his girlfriend's pregnancy, Ralphie's life spirals when he meets a mysterious family. Writer/director John Trengove's thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Adrien Brody and Odessa Young.

programme.title: PS I Love You
programme.desc: Widowed Holly feels she cannot cope following the death of her husband. However, on her birthday, she receives a letter he wrote to her just before he died, encouraging her to live life to the full rather than languish in sorrow. This is just the first in a series of messages, each one sending her on wild misadventures and helping her to move on. Romantic drama based on Cecelia Ahern's novel, starring Hilary Swank, Gerard Butler and Lisa Kudrow.

programme.title: Poison
programme.desc: Lucas and Edith reunite many years after a tragedy drove the former couple apart. Director Désirée Nosbusch's award-winning drama, starring Tim Roth and Trine Dyrholm.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A faded film star from the silent-movie era is fixated with making a comeback. When she meets a struggling screenwriter on the run from debt collectors, she persuades him to write a script that will mark her spectacular return to the screen. However, he takes advantage of the deluded actress, becoming her lover in a relationship where their mutual deceit ends in tragedy. Drama, with Gloria Swanson, William Holden and Eric von Stroheim.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: A British tennis player at the end of his career experiences a change in fortune when he is picked as the wild card for the prestigious tournament. To add to his luck, he meets a rising American star and falls head over heels in love with her - an infatuation that propels him to an unprecedented winning streak. Romantic drama, with Kirsten Dunst, Paul Bettany, Eleanor Bron and Sam Neill.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: Ice skater Tonya Harding rises through the ranks at the US figure skating championships, but her future in the sport is thrown into question by a shocking incident after her ex-husband steps in. Director Craig Gillespie's comedy biopic, starring Margot Robbie, Sebastian Stan, and Allison Janney, who won a Bafta and an Oscar for her performance.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom returns to her childhood home of Plethora, Maine, to attend the funeral of her father, the former town mayor who beat his wife behind closed doors. Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar.

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: A British tennis player at the end of his career experiences a change in fortune when he is picked as the wild card for the prestigious tournament. Romantic drama, with Kirsten Dunst, Paul Bettany, Eleanor Bron and Sam Neill.

programme.title: Anora
programme.desc: A sex worker marries the son of an oligarch, but his family in Russia try to get the marriage annulled. Writer/director Sean Baker's Oscar-winning romantic comedy, starring Mikey Madison, Paul Weissman and Lindsey Normington.

programme.title: The Young Messiah
programme.desc: Biblical drama telling the story of Jesus Christ at the age of seven as he and his family depart Egypt to return home to Nazareth and the youngster begins to discover the true extent of his gifts. Adam Greaves-Neal stars, with Sara Lazzaro, Christian McKay and Sean Bean.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Musical biopic of 1920s singer and comedienne Fanny Brice, who rose from poor beginnings in New York's slums to become an overnight star and the toast of Broadway. Her success, however, came at the price of a turbulent private life and an unhappy marriage to a gambler, who grew increasingly jealous of her fame. Starring an Oscar-winning Barbra Streisand, with Omar Sharif, Kay Medford and Walter Pidgeon.

programme.title: The Young Messiah

programme.desc: Naveen brings his fiancé Jay home to meet his traditional Indian family, and they come to terms with his white-orphan-artist boyfriend while planning the wedding of their dreams. Romantic comedy, starring Karan Soni and Jonathan Groff.

programme.title: Mother!
programme.desc: A secluded couple's relationship is tested when a surgeon and his lewd wife make an unexpected appearance at their remote home, disrupting their peaceful existence. Thriller, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris and Michelle Pfeiffer.

programme.desc: A stand-up comedian struggling with PTSD agonises over whether or not to join the search for a missing teenage girl she used to look after. Writer-director Ally Pankiw's comedy drama, starring Rachel Sennott and Olga Petsa.

programme.title: Cicada
programme.desc: As they continue to recover from separate traumatic events, two young men gradually start to fall for each other. Drama, starring Matthew Fifer and Sheldon D Brown.(n)

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: An American prizefighter retires after killing an opponent in the ring, and returns to his Irish roots in a village in Galway, where he falls for a local woman. Unfortunately, their romance is hampered by a conflict with her brother over a property matter. John Ford's Oscar-winning romantic comedy drama, starring John Wayne, Maureen O'Hara, Victor McLaglen, Barry Fitzgerald and Ward Bond.(n)

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A determined factory welder leads a double life as an exotic dancer by night. Her real ambition is to become a ballet star, and with the support of her boss and an instructor, she sets out to realise her dreams. Drama, with Jennifer Beals, Michael Nouri, Lilia Skala, Sunny Johnson, Kyle T Heffner and Lee Ving.(n)

Frank Darabont's drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows.(n)

programme.desc: After his facial reconstructive surgery, an aspiring actor fixates on a stage production based on his past. Psychological thriller, starring Sebastian Stan, Adam Pearson and Renate Reinsve.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel House's comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll.(n)

programme.desc: After a storm wrecks their home, a speedy sloth called Laura and her eccentric family move to the big city in their rusted food truck in the hope of making their business a success. Animated adventure, with the voices of Leslie Jones and Remy Hii.(n)

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: Green-skinned Elphaba Thropp becomes part of the new intake at Shiz University, and shares a room with fellow spell-caster Galinda Upland. It's the beginning of a friendship which culminates in an epic showdown as Elphaba transforms a renegade witch with a skill for bursting into show-stopping songs, like Defying Gravity. Part one of The Wizard of Oz prequel based on the hit stage musical, starring Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande-Butera, Jonathan Bailey, Michelle Yeoh and Jeff Goldblum.(n)

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: The blue hedgehog, Knuckles and Tails reunite to face the might of the villainous Shadow, who possesses powers unlike anything they have seen before. programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoff's complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the world's most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose.(n)

programme.desc: When two co-workers survive a killer on Valentine's Day, the two have to find out who it is. Comedy horror, starring Mason Gooding, Olivia Holt and Gigi Zumbado.(n)

programme.desc: During the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, a US sports broadcasting team must adapt to live coverage of the Israeli athletes being held hostage by a terrorist group. Fact-based thriller, starring Peter Sarsgaard, John Magaro and Ben Chaplin.(n)

programme.title: The Room Next Door
programme.desc: Former war correspondent Martha is resigned to the grip of inoperable stage three cervical cancer. She plans to spend her final weeks in a rented property near Woodstock with a euthanasia pill obtained illegally on the dark web. While she awkwardly articulates her desire to stay in control, her friend Ingrid seeks comfort in the company of mutual old flame Damian. Pedro Almodovar's drama, his first feature shot in the English language, starring Tilda Swinton, Julianne Moore, John Turturro and Alessandro Nivola.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man's children stand by him as he deals with courts in upstate New York.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After losing a hotly contested custody battle, a woman disappears with her 11-month-old daughter; the child's father searches four continents for almost two decades before reaching an emotional conclusion.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A random post on a social networking site changes everything about a case that put two brothers in prison for more that two decades.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a woman is found murdered in her bed, her husband and her son accuse each other of being the killer.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After a sudden marriage creates tension between two families, a murder exposes secrets, lies and a long-buried mystery.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: After a young mom is found dead on the side of a country road, 40 miles from her Knoxville home, investigators scramble to figure out how she ended up there.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Press
programme.desc: Interviews with public figures and those making news, setting the political agenda and spotlighting the impact Washington decision-making has on Americans.(n)

programme.title: NBC Nightly News With Tom Llamas

programme.title: Storms of the Century
programme.desc: Looking back at some of the worst hurricanes starting with a storm that changed New Orleans, and the country, forever - Hurricane Katrina; hosted by Al Roker.","large":"Since the turn of the millennium, we're seeing deadly and destructive hurricanes slam into the U-S, leaving an unimaginable toll. "Once-in-a-century" storms are now becoming recurring events. Over the next 30 minutes, we are looking back at some of the worst hurricanes starting with a storm that changed New Orleans, and the country, forever - Hurricane Katrina. Hosted by Al Roker.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A man dies in a shooting incident after tempers flare in a confrontation in Montana's Glacier National Park.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The disappearance of a 20-year-old honors student causes her family to fear the worst; decades later, the mystery is solved.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Robert Davis, who was convicted of murdering a woman and her son, claims his confession was coerced and tries to prove he is innocent.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a woman returns two days after being reported abducted, authorities believe it's a hoax until a similar crime forces them to take another look; twenty-seven women who have accused Bill Cosby of assault get together to share their stories.(n)

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A brilliant woman who rose from poverty and became a successful criminal defense attorney is murdered; investigators look into her clients and follow a bizarre string of clues.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Trapped and depleted, the British Army attempt to carry out a desperate evacuation of northern France. Gripping WWII epic from Christopher Nolan, starring Tom Hardy.

programme.title: Peter Pan
programme.desc: Jason Issacs plays Hook in this captivating adaptation of the classic tale. Rachel Hurd-Wood plays Wendy, who is whisked away to Neverland by the Lost Boys. Flashing images.(109mins).

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: A drunken one-night stand leaves beautiful overachiever Katherine Heigl pregnant by stoner slacker Seth Rogen. Heartfelt comedy. Contains strong language and sexual scenes.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: A mysterious millionaire entertains the elite at his Long Island mansion in an adaptation of F Scott Fitzgerald's classic. With Robert Redford. Contains moderate violence.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Liam Neeson stars as Oskar Schindler, who tries to save Jewish workers from the Nazis. Violence/strong language/mature themes/flashing images.

programme.title: The Blind Side

programme.desc: Actor Alan Cumming, who also has a special relationship with Tonka, adds $10,000 to a reward for Tonka's whereabouts, and the film crew faces an ethical dilemma as parallels are drawn to a previous PETA case that took a dangerous turn in Oregon.

programme.desc: An NBA star, a corrupt cop, a female rap duo, teenage punks, neo-Nazis and a debt collector embark on a collision course in 1987 Oakland, Calif.

programme.title: Away We Go
programme.desc: An expectant couple (John Krasinski, Maya Rudolph) reconnect with old friends and relatives as they travel across America in search of a good place to settle down and raise their family.

programme.title: Leo Reich: Literally Who Cares?!
programme.desc: Stand-up comic Leo Reich blends songs, anecdotes, and anxious non-sequiturs as he muses on social and political causes, coming-of-age experiences, and the challenges of modern life.

programme.title: Ellen DeGeneres: The Beginning
programme.desc: Comic Ellen DeGeneres performs. From the Beacon Theatre in New York.

programme.title: Bill Maher: Is Anyone Else Seeing This?
programme.desc: Comedian Bill Maher addresses societal issues and taboo topics in their stand-up routine, pushing boundaries while aiming to resonate with a large audience.

programme.title: The Pentagon Wars
programme.desc: Col. James G. Burton (Cary Elwes) protests government waste and poor decisions in the development of a troop carrier.

programme.title: Death of a Unicorn
programme.desc: A weekend retreat has deadly consequences when a father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to find his billionaire boss, who seeks to exploit the creature's miraculous curative properties.

programme.title: Get Shorty
programme.desc: A film-loving loan shark (John Travolta) teams with a B-movie producer (Gene Hackman) to become a Hollywood mogul.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Spies (Julia Roberts, Clive Owen) for rival corporations carry on a clandestine love affair while trying to find the formula for a product that will earn a fortune for the company that patents it first.

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: A man (George Clooney) simultaneously struggles with the decision to pull the plug on his comatose wife while facing pressure from relatives to sell 25,000 acres of unspoiled Hawaiian land.

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: A widower (Matt Damon) relocates his family to a dilapidated zoo and, with the help of its eclectic staff, works to restore the facility to its former glory.

programme.title: A Hard Day's Night
programme.desc: John, Paul, George and Ringo (The Beatles) spend 36 wild hours in London, besieged by exuberant fans.

programme.title: Son of the Mask
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a cartoonist's (Jamie Kennedy) son is born with extraordinary powers and the god Loki (Alan Cumming) returns to retrieve his mask.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: A pessimistic magazine article prompts an unmarried woman to revisit her numerous ex-boyfriends to find out if one of them could be her true love.

programme.title: Gary Gulman: The Great Depresh
programme.desc: The actor/comic shares his observations on millennial attitudes, his love for basketball, and menacing TV news theme songs, as well as insights into his own mental health journey and battle with depression; from Roulette Intermedium in Brooklyn, N.Y.

programme.title: James Acaster: Hecklers Welcome
programme.desc: James Acaster gives up control of his set and embraces audience participation as he explores his complex relationship with stand-up.

programme.title: Chris Rock: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: The comic performs at South Africa's Carnival City Casino, the Apollo Theatre in New York and the Carling Apollo Hammersmith in London.

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: You So Crazy
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence performs his stand-up comedy routine in a concert recorded at Brooklyn's Majestic Theatre.

programme.title: Lewis Black: Red, White & Screwed
programme.desc: The comic performs at the Warner Theatre in Washington.

programme.title: Nikki Glaser: Good Clean Filth
programme.desc: Nikki Glaser takes on a range of topics in her brutally honest yet conversational style, including dishing about sex, outlining the do's and don'ts of dating, how to trick someone into marriage and oversharing about her not-so-private parts.

programme.title: Shazam!

programme.desc: Andy's life gets upended when his wife enters a 90-day rehab program, leaving him in charge of their twins. With his career falling by the wayside, he soon leans on his pregnant daughter for support, ultimately becoming the father she never had.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriend's seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Lorraine (Vera Farmiga) and Ed (Patrick Wilson) Warren confront a powerful demonic entity when they try to help parents and children being terrorized in their secluded farmhouse.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, failed comedian Arthur Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

programme.title: Joker: Folie Ã Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: How We Get Free
programme.desc: Over the course of two years, Elisabeth Epps works to end cash bail on all fronts, from bailing people out of jail to running for office as one of the first abolitionist candidates in Colorado.

programme.title: Life After
programme.desc: A single mother and Indian immigrant travels to New York City to clear out her daughter's apartment.

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: A family embarks on a perilous journey as a planet-killing comet hurtles toward Earth. As the countdown to the global apocalypse approaches zero, their incredible trek culminates in a desperate and last-minute flight to a possible safe haven.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Two soldiers must find the army's golden standard; the Senate worries about Caesar's popularity; Atia is careful to play both sides of an escalating power struggle.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Mark Antony returns to Rome; Vorenus heads home to his family; Pompey drafts an ultimatum stripping the general of his power.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Pompey makes an unusual tactical decision; Atia enlists her mercenary to ensure her family's security; Pullo's unit intercepts a cargo wagon.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar seeks to consolidate his hold on Rome; Atia throws a party; Pullo delivers Quintus Pompey to Caesar.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar weighs Pompey's counteroffer; Vorenus must reconsider his career choices; Atia concocts a scheme to come between Caesar and Servilia.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Mark Antony runs Rome while Caesar pursues Pompey; Pullo takes Octavian to a brothel; Atia tries to mend fences with Servilia.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Vorenus and Pullo are marooned in the Adriatic Sea; Pompey decides to attack Caesar's depleted forces; Atia enlists Octavia to ask a favor of Servilia.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar arrives in Alexandria and meets the king; Vorenus and Pullo free Ptolemy's incarcerated sister; Caesar seeks payment from Egypt for past debts.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar returns home; Vorenus and Pullo have a showdown with a local thug; Servilia's plan backfires.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Caesar becomes emperor; Vorenus and Pullo plan their futures.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Pullo descends into Rome's netherworld; Vorenus receives rewards for his allegiance.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Pullo and Vorenus receive rewards; Caesar decides to overhaul the Senate; Servilia hurdles the final obstacle in her revenge scenario.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Mark Antony makes plans to leave the city; Vorenus mourns his wife; Vorenus and Pullo learn that Erastes has abducted Vorenus' children.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Cleopatra arrives in Rome; Vorenus is ordered to assume Erastes' captaincy; Octavian infuriates his mother and Mark Antony.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Brutus and Cassius struggle to raise foreign money for an army; Cicero sends a message to the Senate in which he gives his support to Octavian.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Atia turns the tables on Servilia; Octavian wins a battle; Vorenus learns of his children's fate.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Vorenus returns to the Collegium; two former adversaries patch up their differences.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Vorenus receives orders to execute scores of Rome's elite; Octavia reveals a secret to Atia; two armies clash, with the future of Rome at stake.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Servilia drives Atia to distraction; Octavian, Mark Antony and Lepidus agree to divide Rome's territories; Eirene insists that Pullo punish Gaia for insubordination.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Octavian proclaims a new era in Rome; Vorenus uncovers treachery behind a missing gold shipment.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Rome is left suffering by the devastation of the grain supply,it triggers fresh hostilities between Octavian and Mark Antony; Octavian sends Atia to Egypt to plead with her ex-lover.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: In the aftermath of battle, Mark Antony returns to Alexandria; Octavian tries to convince Pullo to give up Cleopatra's palace; Vorenus flees with Caesarion.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Jor-El (Marlon Brando) of Krypton sends his baby to Earth, where he grows up as Clark Kent (Christopher Reeve) and works at the Daily Planet.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel (Christopher Reeve) gets serious with Lois Lane (Margot Kidder) and fights three Krypton outcasts in league with Lex Luthor (Gene Hackman).

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Ersatz kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman (Christopher Reeve) in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel (Christopher Reeve) crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's (Gene Hackman) latest creation, Nuclear Man.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: While Lex Luthor plots against him, the Man of Steel tries to reconnect with Lois Lane and find his place in a world that learned to survive in his absence.

programme.desc: Depression-era outlaw John Dillinger (Johnny Depp) becomes the fledgling FBI's most-wanted criminal and a folk hero to much of America's downtrodden public.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A journalist is invited to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by the star's cult of sycophants, she gets caught in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
programme.desc: After running away from a residential nursing home to pursue his dream of becoming a pro wrestler, a man who has Down syndrome befriends an outlaw who becomes his coach and ally.

programme.title: Billy Joel: And So It Goes
programme.desc: After the success of "Piano Man," Billy Joel's career takes off with a string international hits and record-breaking tours.

programme.title: Billy Joel: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Through countless setbacks, Joel reinvents himself with a return to his roots and a residency at Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: End of Watch
programme.desc: Two LAPD officers deal with marriage, love and fatherhood amid the harsh realities on the streets of Los Angeles.

programme.title: Mr. Nobody
programme.desc: In 2092, the last mortal human on Earth reflects on his long past and thinks about the lives he might have led.

programme.title: Little Men
programme.desc: Two teens develop a growing friendship in Brooklyn, N.Y., while the feud between their respective parents (Greg Kinnear, Jennifer Ehle) continues to escalate.

programme.title: Dear Ms.: A Revolution in Print
programme.desc: A deep dive into the storied and complex legacy of "Ms." magazine through the lens of some of its covers.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Teens meet with horrible ends after a classmate's (Devon Sawa) precognitive vision leads to their ejection from a doomed airliner.

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Death returns to claim the lives of those who did not die in a horrible highway calamity as they were meant to do.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: A high-school senior (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) and her friends must deal with repercussions of cheating death when they survive a terrible roller-coaster accident.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: A horrifying premonition saves a young man (Bobby Campo) and his friends from death during a racetrack accident, but terrible fates await them nonetheless.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: When a man's premonition saves them from a fatal bridge collapse, several unfortunate souls learn that Death will not be cheated.

programme.title: Final Destination Bloodlines
programme.desc: Plagued by a violent and recurring nightmare, a college student heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 1
programme.desc: After shattering the games forever, Katniss (Jennifer Lawrence) finds herself in District 13, fighting to save Peeta (Josh Hutcherson) and a nation moved by her courage.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 2
programme.desc: Katniss faces mortal traps, deadly enemies and moral choices when she and her closest friends leave District 13 to assassinate President Snow and liberate the citizens of war-torn Panem.

programme.title: Couples Retreat
programme.desc: Four couples find that paradise comes at a price when they must participate in therapy sessions at a tropical resort.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: A poor boy (Freddie Highmore) and four spoiled children win a tour through the incredible factory of an odd confectioner (Johnny Depp).

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helm's daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Morbius
programme.desc: Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others from the same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble. While at first it seems to be a radical success, a darkness inside of him is soon unleashed.

programme.title: Here to Climb
programme.desc: Sasha DiGiulian rises from child prodigy to a champion sport climber, as she ultimately makes her mark by taking her talents to big walls with a series of first female ascents.

programme.title: My Scientology Movie
programme.desc: Filmmaker Louis Theroux is denied admittance into the Church of Scientology's headquarters, setting into motion a clever, confrontational and funny plan to try and reveal the inner workings of the mysterious organization.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: After foreign troops seize control of an American town, a group of young people takes refuge in the surrounding woods and launches guerrilla attacks against the enemy.

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A scientist's quest to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease unintentionally results in a highly intelligent chimpanzee, which may signal the end of man's dominion over Earth.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Bowling buddies become involved with a multimillionaire and his family wanted by mobsters in 1990s Los Angeles.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organized crime forever.

programme.title: We Live in Time
programme.desc: A surprise encounter brings together a couple, changing the course of their lives. Challenged by the limits of time, they learn to cherish each moment of their decade-spanning and movingly rare love story.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man (Justin Timberlake) must figure out how to bring down a system where time is money, enabling the wealthy to live forever, while the poor must beg for each minute of life.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: Aspiring actor Edward undergoes a radical medical procedure to drastically transform his appearance. But his new dream face turns into a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: A time-space vortex sucks a scientific has-been (Will Ferrell) and his companions (Anna Friel, Danny R. McBride) into an alternate dimension populated by dinosaurs and painfully slow creatures called Sleestaks.

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: A young man (Miles Teller) and his girlfriend (Anna Kendrick) struggle to find desirable employment after graduating from college.

programme.title: Brandy Hellville & the Cult of Fast Fashion
programme.desc: The Instagram-perfect image of Brandy Melville hides a toxic work culture endemic to fast fashion, with discrimination against race, sex and body size.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: Filmmaker Alison Klayman follows political strategist Stephen K. Bannon as he tries to mobilize and unify far-right parties during the 2018 U.S. midterm elections.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when an enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway at a remote cabin turns to chaos when it's revealed that one of the guests -- a subservient android built for human companionship -- has gone haywire.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities. They must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: A descendant of the mysterious secret society known as the Assassins uses his newfound knowledge and physical skills to battle the power-hungry Templar Order.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organized crime forever.

programme.title: Babygirl
programme.desc: A high-powered CEO puts her career and family on the line when she begins a torrid affair with her much younger intern.

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Two criminals (Billy Bob Thornton, Tony Cox) disguise themselves as St. Nick and an elf to rob stores at Christmastime.

programme.title: Bad Santa 2
programme.desc: Fueled by cheap whiskey and greed, a foulmouthed criminal (Billy Bob Thornton), his mean mother (Kathy Bates) and their angry sidekick (Tony Cox) conspire to bilk a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: A Natural History
programme.desc: Delving into the mythological, including dragons, mermaids, and unicorns -- alongside examinations of natural world beasts, such as vervet monkeys, narwhals, and manatees; Stephen Fry travels far and wide to learn about such animals.

programme.desc: From stand-up routines to acting, writing and directing, Albert Brooks becomes a major force in American comedy. Includes testimonials from Larry David, Chris Rock, Sarah Silverman, Jonah Hill, Judd Apatow, Steven Spielberg, James L. Brooks and more.
